description: A man's affection for his recliner, with a pun on 'go way back'.
title: Recliner Bond
n_1: Tom sat in his living room, looking fondly at his recliner.
n_2: He settled into the recliner, relishing its familiar comfort.
c1_2: We’ve had some good times, haven’t we?
n_3: Tom recalled the many years he spent lounging in it.
c1_3: From movie nights to naps, we go way back!
n_4: With a smile, Tom realized just how much history they shared.
c1_4: It's not just a chair; it's a journey!
